title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2511/92 of 27 August 1992 fixing, for unginned cotton, the actual production for the 1991/92 marketing year, the estimated production and the reduction in the aid for the 1992/93 marketing year and the amount by which the guide price is to be reduced for the 1993/94 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2511/92  of 27 August 1992  fixing, for unginned cotton, the actual production for the 1991/92 marketing year, the estimated production and the reduction in the aid for the 1992/93 marketing year and the amount by  which the guide price is to be reduced for the 1993/94 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. For the 1991/92 marketing year, actual production of unginned cotton is hereby determined at 999 024 tonnes.
2. For the 1992/93 marketing year:
- the estimated production is hereby fixed at 1 145 717 tonnes,
- the reduction in the amount of the aid is hereby fixed at ECU 15,419 per 100 kg.
3. For the 1993/94 marketing year, the guide price shall be reduced by ECU 5,140 per 100 kg.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 August 1992. For the Commission
Karel VAN MIERT
Member of the Commission
